duties_responsibilities.duty: Create, update, and coordinate project schedules in collaboration with project management, Operations, and consultant teams.
Lead weekly meetings with Project Managers to get status updates on various projects and ensure consistent scheduling and forecasting.
Provide schedule analysis, metrics, and reports to key stakeholders on a regular basis.
Set and maintain project plan, training dates, and installation project dates.
Assist Project Managers in creating short-term schedules, monitor these schedules, and help correct scheduling problems.
Review and approve proposed schedule changes with Project Managers and establish common standards for data input, database management, schedule maintenance, and report generation.
Perform other job-related duties, responsibilities, and special projects as assigned.
Perform additional administrative tasks as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Operations, or a related field (Master's preferred)
